languages.text: "Не задумываясь. Я дала тебе шанс вернуться на праведный путь, но ты отринул{mf||а} его. Я поклялась икоренять скверну. Если ты отдал{mf|ся|ась} ей, то я исполню свой долг во что бы то ни стало".

"Without a moment's hesitation. I gave you a chance to return to the path of righteousness, but you rejected it. I have sworn to eradicate corruption. If you have succumbed to it, then I will do my duty no matter what it takes."
languages.original_text: "Не задумываясь. Я дала тебе шанс вернуться на праведный путь, но ты отринул{mf||а} его. Я поклялась икоренять скверну. Если ты отдал{mf|ся|ась} ей, то я исполню свой долг во что бы то ни стало".

traits.locale_text: "Without a moment's hesitation. I gave you a chance to return to the path of righteousness, but you rejected it. I have sworn to eradicate corruption. If you have yielded to it, then I will do my duty no matter what it takes."

"Without a moment's hesitation. I gave you a chance to return to the path of righteousness, but you rejected it. I have sworn to eradicate corruption. If you have yielded to it, then I will do my duty no matter what it takes."

"Without a moment's hesitation. I gave you a chance to return to the path of righteousness, but you rejected it. I have sworn to eradicate corruption. If you have yielded to it, then I will do my duty no matter what it takes."

"Without a moment's hesitation. I gave you a chance to return to the path of righteousness, but you rejected it. I have sworn to eradicate corruption. If you have succumbed to it, then I will do my duty no matter what it takes."

"Without a moment's hesitation. I gave you a chance to return to the path of righteousness, but you rejected it. I have sworn to eradicate corruption. If you have succumbed to it, then I will do my duty no matter what it takes."

languages.text: “我一刻都不会犹豫。我曾给过你重归正道的机会，但你拒绝了。我发誓要铲除一切腐化，如果你投靠了腐化的势力，那无论要我付出什么样的代价，我都必将履行我的职责。”
languages.original_text: "Without a moment's hesitation. I gave you a chance to return to the path of righteousness, but you rejected it. I have sworn to eradicate corruption. If you have succumbed to it, then I will do my duty no matter what it takes."

traits.locale_text: “我一刻都不会犹豫。我曾给过你重归正道的机会，但你拒绝了。我发誓要铲除一切腐化。如果你投靠了腐化的势力，那无论要我付出什么样的代价，我都必将履行我的职责。”

languages.text: 「迷いなどない。我は正義の道に戻るチャンスを与えた。だが、それを拒んだのだ。そして、我は汚職撲滅を誓った。陛下が汚職に屈したのであれば、何があろうとも義務を果たしましょう」
languages.original_text: "Without a moment's hesitation. I gave you a chance to return to the path of righteousness, but you rejected it. I have sworn to eradicate corruption. If you have succumbed to it, then I will do my duty no matter what it takes."

traits.locale_text: 「迷いなどない。我は正義の道に戻るチャンスを与えた。だが、それを拒んだのだ。そして、我は汚職撲滅を誓った。陛下が汚職に屈したのであれば、何があろうとも義務を果たしましょう」

languages.text: «Sin duda. Le di la oportunidad de volver al camino de la rectitud, pero la rechazó. He jurado erradicar la corrupción. Si ha sucumbido ante ella cumpliré mi deber cueste lo que cueste».
languages.original_text: "Without a moment's hesitation. I gave you a chance to return to the path of righteousness, but you rejected it. I have sworn to eradicate corruption. If you have succumbed to it, then I will do my duty no matter what it takes."

traits.locale_text: «Sin duda. Le di la oportunidad de volver al camino de la rectitud, pero la rechazó. He jurado erradicar la corrupción. Si ha cedido ante ella cumpliré mi deber cueste lo que cueste».

languages.text: "Ohne auch nur einen Augenblick zu zögern. Ich habe Euch die Chance gegeben, auf den Pfad der Rechtschaffenheit zurückzukehren, doch Ihr habt sie zurückgewiesen. Ich habe geschworen, die Verderbnis auszulöschen. Wenn Ihr Euch ihr ergeben habt, dann werde ich meine Pflicht tun, was auch geschieht."
languages.original_text: "Without a moment's hesitation. I gave you a chance to return to the path of righteousness, but you rejected it. I have sworn to eradicate corruption. If you have succumbed to it, then I will do my duty no matter what it takes."

traits.locale_text: "Ohne auch nur einen Augenblick zu zögern. Ich habe Euch die Chance gegeben, auf den Pfad der Rechtschaffenheit zurückzukehren, doch Ihr habt sie zurückgewiesen. Ich habe geschworen, die Korruption auszulöschen. Wenn Ihr Euch ihr ergeben habt, dann werde ich meine Pflicht tun, was auch geschieht."

languages.text: « Sans la moindre hésitation. Je vous ai donné une chance de retourner sur la voie de la droiture, mais vous l'avez rejetée. J'ai fait le serment d'éliminer la corruption. Si vous y avez succombé, alors j'accomplirai mon devoir, quoi qu'il en coûte. »
languages.original_text: "Without a moment's hesitation. I gave you a chance to return to the path of righteousness, but you rejected it. I have sworn to eradicate corruption. If you have succumbed to it, then I will do my duty no matter what it takes."

traits.locale_text: « Sans la moindre hésitation. Je vous ai donné une chance de retourner sur la voie de la droiture, mais vous l'avez rejetée. J'ai fait le serment d'éliminer la corruption. Si vous y avez succombé, alors j'accomplirai mon devoir, quoi qu'il en coûte. »

languages.text: "Tereddüt bile etmem. Doğru yola dönmen için sana şans verdim, sense elinin tersiyle ittin. Ben yozluğun kökünü kazımaya ant içtim. Sen de bu yozluğa düştüysen ne olursa olsun vazifemi yerine getireceğim."
languages.original_text: "Without a moment's hesitation. I gave you a chance to return to the path of righteousness, but you rejected it. I have sworn to eradicate corruption. If you have succumbed to it, then I will do my duty no matter what it takes."
